Michele Blythe
==============

![Michele Blythe ](https://arlingtonwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3378 "Michele Blythe ")



Michele Blythe, Position 4
--------------------------

Email
[Michele Blythe](mailto:mblythe@arlingtonwa.gov)

* Re-elected Term January 2024 through December 31, 2027
* Elected Term January 2020 through December 31, 2024

Michele has 30 successful years in the banking and financial industry. "I have experience mentoring staff, managing multiple bank offices, managing millions of dollars for families and businesses, and experience with audits and risk management."

Michele and her husband moved here in 2004 on military orders. "We were so fortunate to have found this community. We have four grown children and three grandchildren. We always have at least one fur-kid in our home."

Current Affiliations/Associations During Terms on City Council
--------------------------------------------------------------

* Mayor Pro Tem, during second term
* Supporter ASPCA – American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
* Recent Board Member, The NOAH Center, Northwest Organization for Animal Help, 3 years
